The Low B Dispatch Bringing Storytelling to Amateur Sports

      The Low B Dispatch

      The definitive data record of the DMHL. Professional-grade reporting and analytical deep-dives for the Monday/Wednesday Low B division.

      Nicholas Chong

      Project Overview

      Welcome to The Low B Dispatch. This project is an automated end-to-end data pipeline designed to provide professional-grade coverage for the Downtown Men‚Äôs Hockey League (DMHL) in Toronto.

      Historically, amateur sports suffer from a narrative gap‚Äîstats exist on fragmented pages, but the ‚Äústory‚Äù of the week is rarely told. This project bridges that gap by treating raw league data as a source of truth for an AI-driven newsroom, specifically covering the Monday/Wednesday Low B division.

      Every report below is generated autonomously. The pipeline ingests the latest boxscores, analyzes team efficiency metrics, and prompts a specialized LLM agent to write a weekly recap with 100% evidence-backed accuracy.
